turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I would like four medium with extra cheese, and I would like two of them sausage, and two of them pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, bella luna's charges extra for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium pizzas with extra cheese, 2 sausage and 2 pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll like to take them up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
